hero.title: Personalised tutoring with a 95% success rate

features.betterGrades: For better grades and more confidence

benefitSection.title: Top-quality tutors for every learning style
benefitSection.subtitle: Find the ideal tutor based on your child’s level and learning goals
benefitSection.block1Description1: Every student learns differently - personalised tutoring in our interactive, virtual classroom can close any learning gap.
benefitSection.block1Description2: Receive 50-minutes of undivided support from a tutor who tailors the lesson to suit a student’s learning style.
benefitSection.block2Description1: Students experience remarkable progress with our personalised tutoring
benefitSection.block2Description2: 3 in 4 improve by up to 3 grades, and 90% report more confidence in the classroom.
benefitSection.block3Description1: Only 8% of tutor applicants make it through our 5-step selection process. Love your lessons - or you can switch to another tutor for free.
benefitSection.block3Title2: Get tutoring for all ages and levels
benefitSection.block3Description2: Tutors are familiar with local schooling systems for more than 30 subjects, helping guide students from first to final year.

description: From maths to science and more - get tutoring support in 30+ subjects
getting_started: Getting started is as easy as 1-2-3
award_winning_tutoring: Award-winning tutoring with these 3 easy steps
step_1_description: Share your learning needs to match with the ideal tutor, based on personality, learning level and goals.
step_2_description: Join a free, non-binding trial lesson to try out tutoring. No card or commitment required.
step_3_description: Book a customised lesson package to get started with a personalised plan to improve grades and confidence.
we_are_aiming_for_good_grades: We’re always aiming for good grades
see_what_parents_say_about_gostudent: See what parents say about GoStudent
